pullrequest.title: Fix incompatibility with latest boost versions

content.raw: It is an issue on Linux also if you compile boost 1.53 from source (see comment 1 in #657). I only mentioned OSX because that's how I found the issue. It's fixed in the OSX branch, but a user reported it in #657 for ARCH Linux, so I decided to make a pull request. To make things easy though, I'll re-target to default if we're not planning any more patch releases of 1.7.
content.html: It is an issue on Linux also if you compile boost 1.53 from source (see comment 1 in #657). I only mentioned OSX because that's how I found the issue. It's fixed in the OSX branch, but a user reported it in #657 for ARCH Linux, so I decided to make a pull request. To make things easy though, I'll re-target to default if we're not planning any more patch releases of 1.7.
